{{Description|Sucrose used to give names to her volatile [[Anemo Hypostases]], but their line of heirs quickly grew to surpass [[Baron Bunny]] the 893rd.}}
'''Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II''' is [[Sucrose]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Elemental Burst has a total of three pulses.
* Elemental Absorption does not occur until after the first pulse.
* The area in which Elemental Absorption can occur is much smaller than the damage area.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Beth: Unbound Form}} This adds one pulse for a total of four pulses.
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Caution: Standard Flask}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Chaotic Entropy}}
